hr.fer.zemris.webapps.webapp_baza.dao

Interface DAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLDAO

    public interface DAO
    Interface towards the data persistence layer.
    This interface is for working with polls and offers methods for obtaining polls, poll options and updating the number of votes.
    Author:
    Dan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PollInfo getPoll(long pollID)
      Gets the poll with given ID.
      java.lang.Long getPollFromOption(long id)
      Gets the poll ID number from poll option whose ID is given.
      java.util.List<PollOption> getPollOptions(long pollID)
      Gets all options for one poll.
      java.util.List<PollInfo> getPolls()
      Gets all available polls.
      void incPollOptionVotes(long id)
      Increases the number of votes for a single PollOption by 1.

    • Method Detail

      • getPolls

        java.util.List<PollInfo> getPolls()
                           throws DAOException
        Gets all available polls.
        Returns:
        all available polls as a List of PollInfo objects
        Throws:
        DAOException - if any kind of exception occurs

      • getPoll

        PollInfo getPoll(long pollID)
          throws DAOException
        Gets the poll with given ID.
        Parameters:
        pollID - poll's ID number
        Returns:
        a PollInfo with given ID; or null if the poll doesn't exist
        Throws:
        DAOException - if any kind of exception occurs

      • getPollFromOption

        java.lang.Long getPollFromOption(long id)
                          throws DAOException
        Gets the poll ID number from poll option whose ID is given.
        Parameters:
        id - poll option's ID number
        Returns:
        ID number of the poll that contains the poll options with given id; or null if the poll options is not linked with any poll
        Throws:
        DAOException - if any kind of exception occurs

      • getPollOptions

        java.util.List<PollOption> getPollOptions(long pollID)
                                   throws DAOException
        Gets all options for one poll.
        Parameters:
        pollID - ID number of the poll whose options are required
        Returns:
        all poll options for the poll with given ID number as a List of PollOption objects
        Throws:
        DAOException - if any kind of exception occurs

      • incPollOptionVotes

        void incPollOptionVotes(long id)
                 throws DAOException
        Increases the number of votes for a single PollOption by 1.
        Parameters:
        id - poll option's id
        Throws:
        DAOException - if any kind of exception occurs
